TopicTitle: Advanced orbital info/approach info tabs locked in transferred save

Articles.Content: I copied a 1.6 save into my 1.7 version. The new advanced orbital info/approach info tabs are locked. I'm guessing something in the save file needs to be added to enable these. Anyone know what that would be?

Maybe a mod conflict / outdated mod?

What mods are you running?

Can you provide your save game?

Logfiles?
